trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDSHOP_00312_JAQUOINIE_000_000<tab>Will you be registering for the next mission? If so, you will need to submit proof of purchase for a tank of ceruleum.

TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDSHOP_00312_JAQUOINIE_000_010<tab>...Ah, a thousand pardons, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. Due to the dangers our parties often face on these expeditions, we can accept only the most experienced individuals.
TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDSHOP_00312_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>In order to embark upon an Ishgardian exploratory mission, you and your party must meet the following requirements:
TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDSHOP_00312_SYSTEM_000_012<tab>※You must have completed the main scenario quest “Heavensward.”
TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDSHOP_00312_SYSTEM_000_013<tab>You must be a level 60 Disciple of War or Magic.

TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDSHOP_00312_SYSTEM_000_014<tab>To review your quest progression, select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> from the main menu, followed by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Journal<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDSHOP_00312_JAQUOINIE_000_020<tab>Wait─have you spoken with Lord Aurvael yet? I thought not. It would be best if you did so first.

TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDSHOP_00312_A1_000_001<tab>Purchase <var 08 E803 ((<var 08 E2E8030B ((<var 09 E803 ((one)) ((two)) ((three)) ((four)) ((five)) ((six)) ((seven)) ((eight)) ((nine)) ((ten)) /var>)) ((<var 20 E803 /var>)) /var>)) ((<var 20 E803 /var>)) /var> <var 31 ((Item)) 04E802E80302 /var> for <var 22 E804 ((,)) /var> gil.

TEXT_REGROC2SKYISLANDSHOP_00312_Q2_000_000<tab>Purchase <var 08 E803 ((<var 08 E2E8030B ((<var 09 E803 ((one)) ((two)) ((three)) ((four)) ((five)) ((six)) ((seven)) ((eight)) ((nine)) ((ten)) /var>)) ((<var 20 E803 /var>)) /var>)) ((<var 20 E803 /var>)) /var> of the following for <var 22 E804 ((,)) /var> gil?
